title: The Broken Haven
description: After an unfortunate incident, seventeen year old Eleanor Loveless is tossed off the top of a cliff, dubbed 'Suicide Hill' because of its infamous reputation.  She lands in a mysterious town populated by all the suicide victims who ever made the jump, where she is shunned as an outsider. Eleanor finds solace in Phillip Kidd, the only town resident who seems willing to go out of his comfort zone to help her survive in their broken world.With a fresh view of the afterlife, The Broken Haven unravels Eleanor's unforeseen impact on the town above and the town below.
author: Sarah Galyean Jones
